common_0088_head_teacher_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR PKNAME(0001)] seems to have taken quite
a\r
liking\r
to\r
you,\r
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0088_head_teacher_02:
This is your first Pokémon, yes? Please raise it
with love and care.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0088_head_teacher_06:
And of course, be sure to keep it tucked safely
inside a Poké Ball.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0088_rival_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]... I can’t believe you
actually\r
chose [VAR PKNAME(0001)]...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_rival_02:
I mean, like, way to make the perfect choice
for you! You two make such a good combo![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_rival_05:
Can I choose one of these Pokémon too,
Director Clavell?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_head_teacher_07:
Oh, but...did you not receive a Pokémon when
you entered the academy, Miss Nemona?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0088_rival_06:
Not back then, no! I had other Pokémon I was
focused on raising at the time.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_rival_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)]But now I want to raise a new Pokémon alongside
[VAR TRNAME(0000)] while [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she raises h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser\r
own\r
new partner![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_head_teacher_09:
[VAR BD06(0000)]If you wish to raise one of these Pokémon on
equal footing with M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss\r
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]\r
here,\r
I shall\r
be\r
more\r
than\r
happy\r
to\r
allow it.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0088_rival_09:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Since [VAR TRNAME(0000)] chose
[VAR PKNAME(0001)],\r
I’ll\r
go\r
for\r
this\r
little one![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_rival_10:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Nice to meet you, [VAR PKNAME(0002)]! Welcome to
the team![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_rival_03:
Now that we’ve chosen our Pokémon, we HAVE
to battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_rival_04:
I’ll be waiting for you down at the beach.
Come join me when you’re ready![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0088_head_teacher_03:
As you may have noticed, Miss Nemona is a tad
overly fond of Pokémon battling.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0088_head_teacher_04:
But I do hope you’ll join her for a battle. It will
help you get to know your own Pokémon as well.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0088_head_teacher_05:
Miss Nemona was hoping you would join her at
the beach, wasn’t she? She’d be ever so happy\r
if you agreed to a battle with her.[VAR 0114(000A)]
